title: Tokonatsu☆Sunshine
center: Chisato Arashi Rurino Osawa (Mira-Cra Park! [[Hasunosora Cover Song List
description: Tokonatsu☆Sunshine (常夏☆サンシャイン lit. Everlasting☆Sunshine) is an insert song sung by Kanon Shibuya, Keke Tang, Chisato Arashi, and Sumire Heanna that appeared in Love Live! Superstar!! Season 1 Episode 6. It was released on September 29, 2021.
